title: Fix runtime/build error, regenerate working build, and provide direct portfolio link

requirements.text: Identify and fix the error reported in the current deployed draft so the portfolio site runs without runtime errors and builds successfully (no TypeScript errors, routing errors, or missing asset-path errors).

quotes: there is an error please regenerate it porperly

acceptanceCriteria: `npm`/build pipeline completes successfully with no TypeScript errors.
App loads all routes (`/`, `/about`, `/vision-mission`, `/services`, `/gallery`, `/contact`) without blank screens or uncaught exceptions.
Browser console shows no uncaught errors on initial load and while navigating to the Gallery/Portfolio page.
All referenced static assets used by the UI (logo, hero background, gallery images) resolve to valid paths (no 404s for `/assets/...`).

requirements.text: Rename the primary navigation and footer link label from "Gallery" to "Portfolio" while keeping the existing route path `/gallery` and ensuring the Gallery page header and SEO-relevant page title/heading remain consistent and user-friendly.

quotes: then give me the direct link of our portfolio

acceptanceCriteria: Header navigation shows a "Portfolio" link that navigates to `/gallery`.
Footer quick links show "Portfolio" and navigate to `/gallery`.
The `/gallery` page remains accessible directly via URL and continues to function with category tabs and lightbox behavior unchanged.

requirements.text: Deploy/publish the regenerated build and provide the direct live URL to the portfolio page (the deployed site URL plus `/gallery`) as the "direct link of our portfolio".

quotes: then give me the direct link of our portfolio .

acceptanceCriteria: A publicly accessible deployed site URL is produced.
A direct portfolio URL ending in `/gallery` is produced and loads the portfolio page successfully.

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only Shadcn components).
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrap files: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in `backend/main.mo`; only add `backend/migration.mo` if a state upgrade is required.
No automated scraping of social media content; use only existing local/static assets already in the repo.
nonGoals: Adding new pages beyond the existing routes.
Changing the service taxonomy or gallery category behavior (other than the link label rename requested).
Introducing third-party authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
